chapters.title: Prologue: Lightnings
chapters.info: Galina Casban, p. 16 (5)—Aes Sedai of the Red Ajah. She has actually been of the Black Ajah for all but five of her almost ninety years wearing the shawl; she is of high standing among the Black sisters. She has been the head of the Red Ajah for almost twenty years now, and led the expedition to bring Rand to Tar Valon after he was shielded. She was captured by the Shaido after the battle at Dumai's Wells. Galina has long black hair without a touch of gray in it. She claims to have helped break two Amyrlin's as a Black sister. One (Siuan Sanche) was deposed and stilled, and the other (presumably Tamra Ospenya) was made to appear that she had died in her sleep. She led the circle that stilled Siuan. She is one of only three who know that Alviarin heads the Supreme Council of the Black Ajah. See also Feir, Tarna; Sevanna.
